channel.title: CVE Feed for Wiz -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wiz -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9145|2024-10-01T07:49:49.613Z -- wiz -- wiz%20code%20visual%20studio%20code%20extension
item.description: Wiz Code Visual Studio Code extension in versions 1.0.0 up to 1.5.3 and Wiz (legacy) Visual Studio Code extension in versions 0.13.0 up to 0.17.8 are vulnerable to local command injection if the user opens a maliciously crafted Dockerfile located in a path that has been marked as a "trusted folder" within Visual Studio Code, and initiates a manual scan of the file.
